DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts or/and supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures; monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (i.e., under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject), collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts or/and supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures; monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (i.e., under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject), collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts or/and supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures; monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (i.e., under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject), collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.

Concepts.definition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/19/10 released per VCDE request post Silver Review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
